author: jeremias
msg: Split PrintRenderer into PageableRenderer and PrintRenderer (extends PageableRenderer). This allows the use of FOP with JPS. A new example illustrates how this is done.
Removed the code that sets start/end/copies from system properties (now done through renderer options).

author: hboutemy
msg: [MJXR-60] use ${project.build.sourceEncoding} as default value for "encoding" parameter

author: jeremias
msg: Throw a useful exception when the user agent isn't set on the renderer. This has been a problem for more than one person setting up their own renderer using FOUserAgent.setRendererOverride().

author: hboutemy
msg: [MJAVADOC-182] use ${project.build.sourceEncoding} as default value for "encoding" parameter
